titles.title: Input and Output Files for DEG analysis using edgeR

descriptions.description:
Input count data (*_input.txt files, calculated by kallisto software) and output DEG analysis data (*_output.txt files, calculated by edgeR tool). 5M, 20M, or 30M indicates the number of subsampled reads used in the analysis.
1. Files with NO80_p[1-7]_[5|20|30]M_[input/output].txt or NO80_s[1-6]_[5|20|30]M_[input/output].txt These files were for the calculation of Fig. 2b, where NO80_p1_* NO80 vs RIN1.0, 2.2 NO80_p2_* NO80 vs RIN2.2, 3.8 NO80_p3_* NO80 vs RIN3.8, 5.3 NO80_p4_* NO80 vs RIN5.3, 6.3 NO80_p5_* NO80 vs RIN6.3, 7.1 NO80_p6_* NO80 vs RIN7.1, 8.0 NO80_p7_* NO80 vs RIN8.0, 9.0 NO80_s1_* NO80 vs RIN1.0, 2.2, 3.8 NO80_s2_* NO80 vs RIN2.2, 3.8, 5.3 NO80_s3_* NO80 vs RIN3.8, 5.3, 6.3 NO80_s4_* NO80 vs RIN5.3, 6.3, 7.1 NO80_s5_* NO80 vs RIN6.3, 7.1, 8.0 NO80_s6_* NO80 vs RIN7.1, 8.0, 9.0
2. Other files were used for the calculation of Table 3, where AE: Directly submerged in Ethanol AR: Directly submerged in RNAlater CE: Crushed and submerged in Ethanol CR: Crushed and submerged in RNAlater CT: Crushed and submerged in TRIzol NO: Flash-frozen in liquid nitrogen
